      • enableProjectActionsBts

        public void enableProjectActionsBts(boolean isCompile,
                                    boolean isRun)
        Enables the buttons for actions to compile and run a project. The specified booleans each are true to enable, false to disable
        Parameters:
        isCompile - the boolean for compile actions
        isRun - the boolean for run actions

      • enableUndoRedoBts

        public void enableUndoRedoBts(boolean isUndo,
                              boolean isRedo)
        Enables or disables the buttons for und/redo actions. The specified boolean each are true to enable, false to disable
        Parameters:
        isUndo - the boolean for undo actions
        isRedo - the boolean for redo actions
